name: Baked Tortilla Chips
description: Crispy, crunchy tortilla chips made easy at home.
preparation: Stack tortillas one on top of each other in a pile. Cut into wedges to make chips.
Working in batches, spread wedges out on a Multipurpose Tray without overlapping. Brush with water and sprinkle with seasoning.
Microwave on high for 1â€“2 minutes until lightly crispy.
tips: Chips will crisp slightly as they cool.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 protein serving, 1 cup Poco Picante Salsa, and 1 cup veggies.
